TITLE: Episode 4 - Texas Bigotry or Overbearing Mother?
DESCRIPTION: In Texas, is it the case of a religiously intolerant father or an overbearing mother? We touch on the scandal of Congresswoman Katie Hill and wonder why gender reveal parties lead to explosions and death.
CONTENT: In Texas, is it the case of a religiously intolerant father or an overbearing mother? We touch on the scandal of Congresswoman Katie Hill and wonder why gender reveal parties lead to explosions and death.
